lines.text: There are many sounds around us, each is slightly different. So small as to go un-noticed by the person who is unaware. Do not hear the wood split. Hear the only sound of axe, cutting air. Read the air itself. It has much say to you.

[Mackle aims a gun at him]
Oh, shit.
This is a real shame, Cabot.

[to Zamir]
The Khan explained the game! Now back off!

[setting fire to the rope on which Cabot is climbing]
Burn, you bastard!

[throwing a sword at Cabot]
Die, you bastard!

[stepping out from behind some trees]
The finish line for you, is right here, Cabot.
